"},"$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/comments/comments-template":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/comments/comments-template","created":"20211029124219377","modified":"20211029182817021","tags":"show-content","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"
<$list filter="[all[tiddlers+shadows]role[comment]containssort[created]!has[draft.of]]">
<$link>{{!!creator}} at <$view field="modified" format="date" template="0hh:0mm:0ss DDD DDth MMM YYYY"/> <$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/Thinkup/CommentsToolbarButton]!has[draft.of]]" variable="listItem"> <$transclude tiddler=<> mode="inline"/>
<$reveal type="match" state="!!edit-mode" text="yes"> <$edit-text tiddler=<> tag="textarea" focus="true"/> <$reveal type="nomatch" state="!!edit-mode" text="yes"> <$transclude tiddler=<> mode="block"/>
"},"$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/comments/filter-all-comments":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/comments/filter-all-comments","created":"20211029122811467","description":"All comments","filter":"[role[comment]!sort[modified]]","modified":"20211102110650145","tags":"$:/tags/Filter","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki"},"$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/comments/header-view-template-segment":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/comments/header-view-template-segment","created":"20211029132237328","list-before":"$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/body","modified":"20211030051844432","tags":"$:/tags/ViewTemplate","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\define display-original-comment() <$link><$text text=<>/> \end \define find-original-comment(exclude) <$list filter="[role[comment]]" emptyMessage=<> variable="ignore"> <$list filter="[listsort[title]] -[enlist<__exclude__>]"> <$set name="newExclude" filter="[enlist<__exclude__>] []"> <$macrocall $name="find-original-comment" exclude=<>/> \end <$list filter="[all[current]role[comment]]" variable="ignore">
This tiddler is a comment on <$list filter="[listsort[title]]"> <> <$list filter="[listrole[comment]sort[title]limit[1]]" variable="ignore">

Parent comments:

    <$list filter="[listrole[comment]sort[title]]">
  • <$link to=<>><$text text=<>/>
"},"$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/comments/sidebar-segment":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/comments/sidebar-segment","created":"20211029131216305","list-after":"$:/core/ui/SideBarSegments/site-subtitle","modified":"20211029131926235","tags":"$:/tags/SideBarSegment show-content","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"<$reveal state="$:/config/Comments/EnableWikiComments" type="match" text="yes" default="no"> <$tiddler tiddler="$:/SiteTitle"> <$transclude tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/comments/add-comment-button" mode="inline"/> "},"$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/comments/sidebar":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/comments/sidebar","caption":"Comments","created":"20211029131237923","modified":"20211029131557997","tags":"","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"
<$list filter="[all[tiddlers+shadows]role[comment]has[modified]!sort[modified]eachday[modified]]">
<$view field="modified" format="date" template="DDth MMM YYYY"/> <$list filter="[all[tiddlers+shadows]role[comment]sameday:modified{!!modified}!sort[modified]]">
<$link>Comment by '<$view field="modifier">(anonymous)' on <$list filter="[listsort[title]]"> <$link to=<>><$text text=<>/>
"},"$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/comments/styles":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/comments/styles","created":"20211029130710247","modified":"20211030051715133","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\rules only filteredtranscludeinline transcludeinline macrodef macrocallinline .tc-is-comment-header { padding:0.25em; border-radius: 4px; /* border: 2px solid #c1e1ea; background: #f1fcff; */ border: 2px solid <>; background: <>; } /* .tc-comments-segment { border-top: 2px solid #d7eef4; } */ .tc-comment-button button { width: 100%; text-align: right; } .tc-sidebar-scrollable .tc-comment-button button { width: auto; text-align: right; } .tc-comment-button button svg { /* fill: #26cb56;*/ fill: <>; height: 1.5em; /* by mohammad */ width: 1.5em; } /* Mohammad --------------*/ .tc-comment-button:hover button svg{ fill: <> ; } .tc-comments {} .tc-comment-list { list-style: none; padding-left: 0; } .tc-comment-list .tc-comments { padding-left: 1em; } .tc-comment-entry { position: relative; border-radius: 4px; margin: 0.5em 0 0 0; /* background: #f1fcff;*/ /* border: 2px solid #c1e1ea; */ border: 2px solid <>; background: <>; } .tc-comment-entry-heading { font-size: 0.7em; font-weight: bold; text-transform: uppercase; /* background: #d7eef4; color: #5B6D80; */ background: <>; color: <>; padding: 0 0.5em; } .tc-comment-entry-body { font-size: 0.8em; padding: 0 0.5em; } .tc-comment-entry-body textarea { font-size: 1.1em; width: 100%; min-height: 40px; resize: vertical; /* user can resize vertically, but width is fixed */ } "},"$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/comments/toolbar-button-cancel":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/comments/toolbar-button-cancel","created":"20211029121235226","modified":"20211029121235226","tags":"$:/tags/Thinkup/CommentsToolbarButton","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"<$reveal <> \end <>"},"$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/macros/stabs":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/macros/stabs","created":"20211028173456201","modified":"20211103150316484","tags":"show-content","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\define make-caption() <$transclude tiddler={{$(currentTiddler)$!!icon}} mode=inline/> \define hide-tabs-button() <$list filter="[!is[blank]]"> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible tab-button" actions="""<$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text="" />""">{{$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/images/close}} \end \define thinkup-stabs(filter)
<$vars tempdataTid="xx$:/temp/thinkup-tabs/$(currentTiddler)$">
<$vars currentTab= {{{ [get[text]] }}} > <> <$list filter=<<__filter__>> > <$vars btnClass= {{{ [matchthen[tc-btn-invisible tab-button selected]else[tc-btn-invisible tab-button]] }}} > <$button class=<> tooltip={{{[get[tooltip]]}}} actions="""<$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text=<> />""" ><>
<$vars currentTab= {{{ [get[text]] }}} > <$list filter="[subfilter<__filter__>match] ~[subfilter<__filter__>first[]]" variable=tab> <$vars contentStyle= {{{ [matchthen[display:block;]] }}} >
> > <$transclude tiddler=<> mode=block/>
\end"},"$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/macros/tag-cloud":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/macros/tag-cloud","created":"20210831144029397","modified":"20211102190815667","tags":"show-content","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\define getTags() <$list filter="[all[tiddlers]!prefix[$:/]tags[]] +[!prefix[$:/]] $(extra_filter)$"> <$text text="[["/>{{{ [tagging[]count[]] }}}°≈°<><$text text="]]"/> \end \define sortTags() <$list filter="[enlist!sortan[]] :filter[split[°≈°]first[]compare:integer:gteq<__n__>]" > <$list filter="[split[°≈°]last[]]"><$text text="[["/><><$text text="]]"/> \end \define tagcloud_showbycount(n:5, extrafilter:"") <$vars extra_filter=<<__extrafilter__>> > <$wikify name="items" text=<> > <$wikify name="sorted" text=<> > <$list filter=<>> <$vars count={{{ [tagging[]count[]] }}}> <><> \end "},"$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/macros/utility":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/macros/utility","created":"20210803141955154","modified":"20211103115832084","tags":"show-content","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\define tidNodeExplorerConfig() $:/config/Thinkup/NodeExplorer \define tidStabsConfig() $:/config/Thinkup/Stabs/EnableFilter \define tidExcludeStabsConfig() $:/config/Thinkup/Stabs/ExcludeFilter"},"Question":{"title":"Question","caption":"{{$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/images/question}} Questions","color":"#af002a","created":"20210507085035852","icon":"$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/images/question","modified":"20211030142928573","tags":"$:/tags/Thinkup","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"{{||$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/templates/new-from-sidebar}}"},"$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/readme","created":"20211024153442213","modified":"20211024160812052","tags":"","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"; Thinkup describe what is the plugin in one paragraph ;Code and demo For learning plugin features, syntax, tutorial and examples see the plugin demo and code pages * Demo: https://kookma.github.io/TW-Thinkup/ * Code: https://github.com/kookma/TW-Thinkup "},"$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/settings/node-explorer":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/settings/node-explorer","created":"20211102191128372","modified":"20211102201352508","tags":"","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\import $:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/macros/utility ;Node explorer filters (what shows node explorer) :<$checkbox tiddler=<> index="links" checked=yes> links :<$checkbox tiddler=<> index="backlinks" checked=yes> backlinks :<$checkbox tiddler=<> index="tagging" checked=yes> tagging :<$checkbox tiddler=<> index="transclusion" checked=yes> transclusion ;Node explorer display format :<$radio tiddler=<> index="display" value=table> dynamic table :<$radio tiddler=<> index="display" value=flat > simple flat list "},"$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/settings/stabs":{"title":"$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/settings/stabs","created":"20211102113355962","modified":"20211102201430910","tags":"","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\import $:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/macros/utility \define activateAction() <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $field=text $value="[all[current]tag[myTag]]" /> \define radioAction(status:"disabled") <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $field=status $value=$status$ /> \define select(description,filter) <$radio tiddler=<> field="text" value=<<__filter__>> actions=<> > $description$ \end ;Disable smart tabs :<$checkbox tiddler=<> field="text" checked=".__smart__tabs__disabled__" unchecked=" [all[current]!is[system]] " uncheckactions=<>> Swith smart tabs --- <$reveal type=nomatch stateTitle=<> stateField="text" text=".__smart__tabs__disabled__" default="show"> ; Smart tabs filters (where display smart tabs) : <> : <
